about_the_game:
In a world where the atrocities of the Hydra Order have stirred a fervent resistance, a group of soldier rebels forms a special unit and called themselves the Basterd Blitz. Their mission: to sabotage, disrupt, and dismantle the Hydra Order war machine. Each member has their reasons, from personal vengeance to a burning desire for justice. As the war intensifies, these rebels embark on perilous missions, facing insurmountable odds and waves of enemies. The fate of the war hangs in the balance, with the Basterd Blitz at the forefront of the resistance.



KEY FEATURES

  • Auto-firing weapons by default with a manual aiming option
  • Fast runs (under 30 minutes)
  • Dozens of characters with different strengths available to customize your runs (batter, the fast one, bomber, rocket-man and more)
  • Dozens of items and weapons to choose from (flamethrowers, SMGs, rocket launchers, pistols or bats and knifes)
  • Survive waves lasting 20 to 90 seconds each and kill off as many Hydra soldiers as you can during that time
  • Collect shards to gain experience and get items, new weapons and upgrade from the shop between waves of enemies
  • Accessibility options: tweak the health, damage and speed of enemies so the difficulty is right for you
  • Endless Replayability: With countless combinations of characters, weapons, items and enemies , every playthrough brings a unique challenge

short_description: Basterd Blitz is a top-down 3D arena shooter roguelite where you play as an allied soldier with up to 3 weapons at a time to fight off hordes of enemy soldiers. Choose from a variety of characters with different traits, buy items and upgrade weapons to create unique runs and kill some enemies.
